column5: Breeze Inn has been fully updated & tastefully decorated with soothing coastal colors and fun decor. 5 bedrooms, 3 full baths, pool table with plenty of space to share special moments with loved ones, corporate team building, weddings at the gazebo, a seasonal above ground pool, outdoor games, etc. you will enjoy the expansive views of the bay and even better, the plentiful bay breezes! Large yard, 2 porches, firepit patio under large pecan trees, walking distance to Sylvan Beach Park!
column8: Relax, enjoy, create special memories here...
